Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

validation.validation: The Business Document [Bus Doc] is not of type [Type].
The Business Document [Business Doc] is not in an acceptable state for Closing.
The Business Document [bus doc] is not for the same company or a member of the company hierarchy supplied.
The last accounting date from associated journals for [Business Doc] is greater than the accounting date to be used for the close liquidation journal.
You must specify at least one Business Document to Close for this Procurement Mass Close request.

Select a different accounting date or open the ledger periods associated to this request. The ledger periods of the company or company hierarchies in this mass close request aren't open for the accounting date selected.
